org.eclipse.scada.da.server.common.memory

Interface Attribute

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BitAttribute, ByteAttribute, DoubleIntegerAttribute, FloatAttribute, TriBitAttribute, WordAttribute

    public interface Attribute
    This class defines a data handler generating attributes of a primary value
    See Also:
    Variable
